task.title: Creating a business team
task.shortdesc: steps on how to create a business team

step.cmd: Locate the plus sign in the top right corner of the webpage, click on it and three options will appear.
Click on the create business team option and another overlayed window will appear. You will now choose the team's name, a descripition for the team, then you can click continue.
Once you click continue you can add people to the team using their email associated with their account, you can add as many emails into the box as you need.
Once you have done this you have created a business team.
